versionA.text:
In this question type, you and your partner may have complementary information that is needed in order to solve a problem. Here is a simple example. 
 
 You and your partner have each been assigned a number. Your objective is to enter the sum of the two numbers in the field below. Your assigned number is 7.

versionB.text:
In this question type, you and your partner may have complementary information that is needed in order to solve a problem. Here is a simple example. 
 
 You and your partner have each been assigned a number. Your objective is to enter the sum of the two numbers in the field below. Your assigned number is 4.
